TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SymMethod extends System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.SymMethodBase implements class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod, class System.IDisposable
Public Class SymMethod Inherits SymMethodBase Implements IDisposable, ISymbolMethod
type SymMethod = class inherit SymMethodBase interface ISymbolMethod interface IDisposable

summary.span: 表示符号存储区内的方法。

span.span: Represents a method within a symbol store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供仅与符号相关的特性的方法，如序列点、 词法作用域和参数信息的访问。The class provides access only to the symbol-related attributes of a method, such as sequence points, lexical scopes, and parameter information. 使用类可读取的一种方法与类型相关的属性。Use the classes to read the type-related attributes of a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法。对象的`Finalize`方法将自动调用垃圾回收期间除非终止由垃圾回收器已禁用通过调用方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method.

span.span: Gets the parameters for the current method.
The array of parameters for the current method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的方法签名中定义它们的顺序返回。The parameters are returned in the order that they are defined within the signature of the method. 返回的数组为空，如果该方法不具有参数。The returned array is empty if the method does not have parameters.

param.name: document
param.span: 为其请求 IL 偏移量范围的文档。

span.span: The document for which the IL offset ranges are requested.

span.span: The document line for which the IL offset ranges are requested.

param.name: column

summary.span: 获取与 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 偏移量的范围对应的起始和结束偏移量对的数组，给定位置在此方法内包括该数组。

span.span: Gets an array of start and end offset pairs that correspond to the ranges of Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) offsets that a given position covers within this method.

returns.span: 起始和结束 IL 偏移量对的数组。

span.span: An array of start and end IL offset pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组是数组的格式的整数中的 {{开始时间 1，end1}，{开始时间 2，end2}...}，其中每一对表示的方法中的 IL 偏移量的范围。The array is an array of integers in the format {{start1, end1}, {start2, end2}...}, where each pair represents an IL offset range within the method. 范围数是数组的除以 2 的长度。The number of ranges is the length of the array divided by 2.

span.span: Returns the most enclosing lexical scope corresponding to an offset within a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用方法来启动本地变量的搜索。You can use the method to start local variable searches.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetSequencePoints(int32[] offsets, class System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument[] documents, int32[] lines, int32[] columns, int32[] endLines, int32[] endColumns) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub GetSequencePoints (offsets As Integer(), documents As ISymbolDocument(), lines As Integer(), columns As Integer(), endLines As Integer(), endColumns As Integer())

public: virtual void GetSequencePoints(cli::array <int> ^ offsets, cli::array <System::Diagnostics::SymbolStore::ISymbolDocument ^> ^ documents, cli::array <int> ^ lines, cli::array <int> ^ columns, cli::array <int> ^ endLines, cli::array <int> ^ endColumns);

abstract member GetSequencePoints : int[] * System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument[] * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] -> unit override this.GetSequencePoints : int[] * System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolDocument[] * int[] * int[] * int[] * int[] -> unit
MemberSignature.Usage: symMethod.GetSequencePoints (offsets, documents, lines, columns, endLines, endColumns)

param.name: offsets
param.span: 一个数组，在其中存储序列点相对于该方法的开头的 IL 偏移量。

span.span: An array in which to store the IL offsets from the beginning of the method for the sequence points.

param.name: documents
param.span: 在其中存储序列点所在的文档的数组。

span.span: An array in which to store the documents in which the sequence points are located.

param.name: lines
param.span: 在其中存储序列点所在的文档中的行的数组。

span.span: An array in which to store the lines in the documents at which the sequence points are located.

param.name: columns
param.span: 在其中存储序列点所在的文档中的列的数组。

span.span: An array in which to store the columns in the documents at which the sequence points are located.

param.name: endLines
param.span: 序列点结束的文档中的行的数组。

span.span: The array of lines in the documents at which the sequence points end.

param.name: endColumns
param.span: 序列点结束的文档中的列的数组。

span.span: The array of columns in the documents at which the sequence points end.

summary.span: 获取当前方法的序列点并在指定数组中存储这些信息。

span.span: Gets the sequence points for the current method and stores the information in the specified arrays.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列点用于源文件位置和 IL 偏移量之间进行映射。Sequence points are used to map between source file locations and IL offsets. 每个序列点包含的 IL 偏移量，并指定开始和结束行/列的源文件区域编号相对于对象。Each sequence point consists of an IL offset, and source file region specified by start and end line/column numbers relative to an object. 每个数组的某个特定索引处的每个元素对应于特定序列点。Each element at a specific index of every array corresponds to a specific sequence point. 调用方必须提供预分配的数组以存放要返回的信息。The caller must supply pre-allocated arrays to hold the information to be returned. 数组中的任何值将被覆盖。Any values in the arrays are overwritten. 使用检索所有序列点的计数和创建适当大小的数组。Use to retrieve the count of all sequence points and create arrays of the proper size. 序列点的偏移量排序，并适用于该方法中的所有文档。The sequence points are sorted by offset and are for all documents in the method. 验证每个数组的大小，并将每个序列点信息。 verifies the size of each array and places the sequence point information into each. 如果任何数组是`null`，则不返回该数组的数据。If any array is `null`, the data for that array is not returned.
